summary: THE CONSUMER WHO WAS A SR FIELD ENGINEER ON THE COVRETTE PLATFORM WITNESSED 75 OCCURRENCES WHERE THE STEERING COLUMN LOCK WAS CONTROLLED BY AN ELECTRIC MOTOR AT THE BASE OF THE STEERING COLUMN. FALSE SIGNAL WERE SENT OUT DUE TO SOME COMPLEX ELECTRICAL GREMLINS WITHIN THE ELECTRICAL SYSTEM WHICH WOULD CAUSE THE VEHICLE TO STALL.  (CHEVROLET CORVETTE) *JB
